Title: Dylan Dog: Dead of Night
Overview: Supernatural private eye, Dylan Dog, seeks out the monsters of the Louisiana bayou in his signature red shirt, black jacket and blue jeans.
Genres: Action, Comedy, Horror, Mystery, Science Fiction, Thriller
production_companies: Hyde Park Films, platinum studios, Long Distance Films
Cast: Brandon Routh, Peter Stormare, Sam Huntington
